GH_SECRET_VERIFY.description: The secret key used to verify messages were sent by github, same value need to be set in github.

GH_TARGET_USER.description: The github username that contains the repos the pull requests should be made to.

GH_USER.description: The github username of the bot that will represent all actions taken.

GH_TOKEN.description: Token password for the GH_USER to login and use.

GH_EMAIL.description: The email address to use for git commits for GH_USER.
